# unspecifiedDimension

**Type Property**

A constant that resets a dimension’s value.

## Declaration

```swift
class let unspecifiedDimension: CGFloat
```

## Discussion

Use this constant with any sizing-related [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSplitViewItem] property to reset its value to the standard system default.

## Managing the item thickness

- **automaticMaximumThickness**: The maximum thickness of the split view item when it resizes due to automatic sizing.
- **preferredThicknessFraction**: The preferred thickness of the split view item relative to the split view.
- **minimumThickness**: The minimum thickness of the split view item.
- **maximumThickness**: The maximum thickness of the split view item.
